content.value:
It's annoying that big sites like @techcrunch don't support pingbacks / WebMentions.

But all the spam sites which rip off their content do!

So I've now got a lot of spam to clean up on my blog.
content.html: It's annoying that big sites like @techcrunch don't support pingbacks / WebMentions. But all the spam sites which rip off their content do! So I've now got a lot of spam to clean up on my blog.

photo.alt: Screenshot of my blog. Lots of spam mentions from blogs which have copy and pasted a techcrunch article.
